description:
King Kai becomes concerned after learning that Goku is on a collision course with the ruthless Frieza.  Meanwhile, back on Planet Namek, the battle between Vegeta and Zarbon has begun!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kike Gokuu yo! Freezer ni wa Te o Dasuna
Preste atenção Goku! Não chegue perto de Freeza
โกคูเร่งพลังเต็มพิกัด สุดทางช้างเผือกใช้เวลา 6 วัน
聞け悟空よ! フリーザには手を出すな
